ing: 1/2 (10.5 ounce) can condensed beef consomme (such as Campbell's Â®)
1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®)
des: "My father-in-law first introduced me to this homemade bloody mary mix.  It is very similar to what you'd buy in a store.  Made as is, it is very spicy.  You can customize it to your taste by cutting back on the pepper and hot sauce;  I like about half the pepper and hot sauce.  Enjoy this wonderful mix!  It is so easy and much cheaper than buying pre-made mix."
ins: Mix the tomato juice, beef consomme, Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, hot pepper sauce, celery salt, and black pepper together in a pitcher; chill.
